className.description: Additional classes applied to the icon container

defaultProgressArialabel.description: Aria-label for the default progress icon

iconSize.description:
Size of icon. Overrides the icon size set by the size property. (Type: | 'sm'
| 'md'
| 'lg'
| 'xl'
| '2xl'
| '3xl'
| 'headingSm'
| 'headingMd'
| 'headingLg'
| 'headingXl'
| 'heading_2xl'
| 'heading_3xl'
| 'bodySm'
| 'bodyDefault'
| 'bodyLg')

isInline.description: Indicates the icon is inline and should inherit the text font size and color. Overriden by size and iconSize properties.

isInProgress.description: Indicates the icon is in progress. Setting this property to true will swap the icon with the progressIcon.

progressIcon.description: Icon when isInProgress is set to true. Defaults to a 1em spinner. (React component or element)

progressIconSize.description:
Size of progress icon. Overrides the icon size set by the size property. (Type: | 'sm'
| 'md'
| 'lg'
| 'xl'
| '2xl'
| '3xl'
| 'headingSm'
| 'headingMd'
| 'headingLg'
| 'headingXl'
| 'heading_2xl'
| 'heading_3xl'
| 'bodySm'
| 'bodyDefault'
| 'bodyLg')

shouldMirrorRTL.description:
Flag indicating whether the icon passed as children should be mirrored for
right to left (RTL) languages. This will not mirror the icon passed to progressIcon.

size.description:
Size of the icon component container and icon. (Type: | 'sm'
| 'md'
| 'lg'
| 'xl'
| '2xl'
| '3xl'
| 'headingSm'
| 'headingMd'
| 'headingLg'
| 'headingXl'
| 'heading_2xl'
| 'heading_3xl'
| 'bodySm'
| 'bodyDefault'
| 'bodyLg')
